name: screenshot-to-eagle
title: Screenshot to Eagle
description: macOS Screenshot auto save to Eagle.
author: leonwong282

commands.name: shot-to-eagle
commands.title: Shot to Eagle
commands.subtitle: Default mode
commands.description: Take a screenshot using default mode and save to Eagle

commands.name: shot-to-eagle-selection
commands.title: Shot to Eagle: Selection
commands.subtitle: Area screenshot
commands.description: Take a selection screenshot and save to Eagle

commands.name: shot-to-eagle-window
commands.title: Shot to Eagle: Window
commands.subtitle: Window screenshot
commands.description: Take a window screenshot and save to Eagle

commands.name: shot-to-eagle-fullscreen
commands.title: Shot to Eagle: Full Screen
commands.subtitle: Full screen screenshot
commands.description: Take a full screen screenshot and save to Eagle

commands.name: shot-to-eagle-timed
commands.title: Shot to Eagle: Timed
commands.subtitle: Delayed screenshot
commands.description: Take a timed screenshot (5s delay) and save to Eagle

commands.name: select-folder
commands.title: Select Eagle Folder
commands.subtitle: Choose target folder
commands.description: Select the Eagle folder where screenshots will be saved

preferences.name: eagleApiToken
preferences.title: Eagle API Token
preferences.description: Your Eagle Web API token (optional, find in Eagle settings)

preferences.name: folderId
preferences.title: Target Folder ID
preferences.description: Eagle folder ID where screenshots will be saved (optional, leave empty for root)

preferences.name: defaultMode
preferences.title: Default Screenshot Mode
preferences.description: The default mode for taking screenshots

preferences.name: includeCursor
preferences.title: Include Cursor

preferences.name: playSound
preferences.title: Screenshot Sound

preferences.description: Whether to play the camera sound effect

preferences.name: timedDelay
preferences.title: Timed Delay (seconds)
preferences.description: Delay in seconds for timed screenshot mode

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
